snippet: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton signed an order designating the network, responsible for some of the deadliest attacks against American troops in Afghanistan, a terrorist organization.
abstract: Sec of State Hillary Clinton signs order designating the Taliban-affiliated Haqqani network as a terrorist organization; response to news is muted in Pakistan, easing fears of increased tension with the United States.

byline.original: By DECLAN WALSH and ERIC SCHMITT
byline.contributor: Declan Walsh reported from Islamabad, Pakistan, and Eric Schmitt from Washington. Ihsanullah Tipu Mehsud and Salman Masood contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton signed an order designating the network, responsible for some of the deadliest attacks against American troops in Afghanistan, a terrorist organization.

headline.seo: State Department Blacklists Militant Haqqani Network
